summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The DVD_SubpictureAttributes structure contains information about the DVD subpicture. The method fills in a DVD_SubpictureAttributes structure for a specified stream.

member.name: DVD_SubpictureAttributes.Type
member.summary: Variable of type that indicates whether the subpicture contains language-related content.

member.name: DVD_SubpictureAttributes.CodingMode
member.summary: Variable of type that indicates how the subpicture graphics stream is encoded.

member.name: DVD_SubpictureAttributes.Language
member.summary: Variable of type LCID that identifies the subpicture language if Type equals DVD_SPType_Language.

member.name: DVD_SubpictureAttributes.LanguageExtension
member.summary: Variable of type that identifies the subpicture language extension if Type equals DVD_SPType_Language.
